top_5_critical_items: Missing JSON-LD schema blocks LLM understanding.
No authorship or institutional credibility on key content.
Content lacks question-based formatting used in LLM queries.
Limited citation signals reduce AI trustworthiness.
Missing meta descriptions affect AI platform visibility.

Voice-search formatting is absent, impacting discovery.
Limited citations reduce AI trustworthiness of the content.
